decision_conditions: The proposed variation of condition 2, by virtue of the amended hours for construction operations, would result in an unacceptable detrimental amenity impact on neighbouring residential occupiers in a residential area contrary to policies D4 and D6, Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) Policy 7B and Ealing's Protocol for Minor Material Amendments following grant of planning permission (2015).
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans) of planning permission 213934VAR dated 17/09/2021 for: 'Landscape improvements to public park intended to provide additional public open space and regenerate low quality landscape areas. Includes new play area, recreation facilities, and improvements to existing facilities (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)'.
